mapper.select: SELECT e.exam_id, es.user_id, NVL(es.es_fscore, 0) es_fscore, NVL(es.es_lscore, 0) es_lscore, es.es_edate FROM examscore es, exam e WHERE es.exam_id(+) = e.exam_id AND es.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO examscore ( exam_id, es_fscore, es_lscore, user_id, es_edate ) VALUES ( #{examId}, #{esFscore}, #{esLscore}, #{userId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE examscore SET es_lscore = #{esLscore}, es_edate = SYSDATE WHERE exam_id = #{examId}
mapper.select: SELECT e.exam_id, es.es_fscore, es.es_lscore, es.user_id, es.es_edate, e.exam_nm FROM examscore es, exam e WHERE e.exam_id = #{examId} AND e.exam_id = es.exam_id
